Package org.radarbase.management.service

Class RoleService

java.lang.Object
org.radarbase.management.service.RoleService
@Service @Transactional public class RoleService extends Object
Service Implementation for managing Project.

    • findAll

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public List<RoleDTO> findAll()
      Get the roles the currently authenticated user has access to.

      A system administrator has access to all the roles. A project administrator has access to the roles in their own project.

      Returns:
      the list of entities

    • findSuperAdminRoles

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public List<RoleDTO> findSuperAdminRoles()

      Returns:
      the list of entities

    • getRoleAuthority

      public static org.radarbase.auth.authorization.RoleAuthority getRoleAuthority(RoleDTO roleDto)
      Get the predefined role authority from a RoleDTO.
      Parameters:
      roleDto - roleDto to parse
      Returns:
      role authority
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the roleauthority is not found or does not correctly specify an organization or project ID.

    • findOneByProjectNameAndAuthorityName

      public Optional<RoleDTO> findOneByProjectNameAndAuthorityName(String projectName, String authorityName)
      Get the role related to the given project with the given authority name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the project name
      authorityName - the authority name
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the role if it exists, and empty otherwise
